Look this game is 11 years old if you haven't played it buy it now. It is soooooo much fun. It worth all your money.

portal isn't just a game, it's an experience, and a mighty fun one at that. The thing that makes portal so great is it's simplicity which resulted in the devs making the environment challenging and fun. and if you're bored of the normal story levels you can always play the community built levels, and you can built one yourself and that's bloody wonderful.

tldr: 10/10 experience, must have in everyone's library.

If you liked the first Portal, you‚Äôre gonna like Portal 2 a while lot better. The first game took me 1.2 hours to beat while this one took me about 7-8 hours to beat. The story to this one is amazing, the soundtrack is pumping, the puzzles are fun and sometimes tricky, and the humor is great, especially Wheatley who will give you some laughs whenever he‚Äôs around (and he‚Äôs a meme). I haven‚Äôt played the multiplayer yet, I‚Äôm gonna get to that eventually, but from what I‚Äôve heard, it‚Äôs great. If you haven‚Äôt played this already, wtf are you doing right now?! Go play the damn game!
